responsibilities: • Improve the basic search quality and user experience by optimizing query analysis and text relevance matching.
• Understand e-commerce video content and implement multi-modal matching.
• Improve users' perception of product authority and participate in the design and implementation of core search products.
• Comprehensively improve the end-to-end shopping experience from browsing to after-sales.
• Design and implement the end-to-end ranking system, including recall, first stage ranking, final stage ranking, and mixed row.
• Improve users' personalized shopping interests model.
• Enhance shopping conversion efficiency for merchandise, video, and live stream to promote GMV growth.
• Foster strong and sustainable growth of the ecosystem by solving challenging problems such as supply and demand matching, business cold start, and sustainable business growth.
• Think, analyze, and adjust the evolution of the system to achieve long-term and sustainable growth of GMV.
• Provide guidance and mentorship to teammates.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on improving search quality, user experience, and shopping conversion efficiency, as well as designing ranking systems and fostering ecosystem growth. These tasks do not explicitly mention the use of large language models or the need for fine-tuning and customization of such models. The responsibilities are more aligned with search optimization, user experience, and system design rather than domain-specific language model training.

analysis: The job responsibilities emphasize improving search quality, user experience, and shopping conversion efficiency, but they do not specifically mention crafting or refining prompts for large language models. Therefore, prompt engineering and iterative refinement do not appear directly relevant to the stated responsibilities.
